patterns: what do you want to talk about
responses: I once approached a man called a headstrong preacher named Paul Sunday. He had the finest oil deposit under his home in Little Boston, California. I made him a generous offer, but his reverant worm of a boy, Eli, insulted me.
I'm not a man well versed in jokes. I only know oil. Send crudes.
